name: Vigilant Waffle
description:
By Elias Olson

Use w/s and up/down arrows to balance a waffle on a plate. Avoid the scary mouths while trying to get Mr. Waffle eaten by the happy mouth. For now there are 3 levels, but more to follow!

Music: Elias Olson
